classes

Class EYMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.EYMS

  • public class EYMS
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the one containing all the methods that will be called by the Command Line User Interface. It also stores the data related to the users, the meals and the orders.
    Author:
    Achraf Gharbi, Younes Laaboudi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EYMS()
      The only constructor of the EYMS class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EYMS

        public EYMS()
        The only constructor of the EYMS class. The default date is the date at which the system is executed. The offers list is initialized with only the birthday offer. All the maps are empty in the beginning.

        Ordinary getter
        Returns:
        the date of the system

      • setDate

        public void setDate(java.lang.String dateString)
             throws java.text.ParseException
        Ordinary setter. It will also update the offers list. Therefore, the birthdays of the date can be correctly identified
        Parameters:
        dateString - the date to set in the format dd/mm/yyyy (this is a string)
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if the beginning of the specified string cannot be parsed.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String userName,
                     java.lang.String pwd)
        Login method of the system. It first performs a "logout" by reinitializing the current meal and order. The login will be successful only if the username and the password match those of a registered user.
        Parameters:
        userName - user name of the user
        pwd - password of the user
        Returns:
        true if there is a user with the corresponding user name and password, false otherwise.

      • register

        public boolean register(java.lang.String firstName,
                        java.lang.String lastName,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String pwd,
                        enums.UserRole role)
        Adds a user in the userMap. If a user of the same name already exists, the method will return false.
        Parameters:
        firstName - first name of the user.
        lastName - last name of the user.
        username - user name of the user.
        pwd - password of the user.
        role - role of the user. (Client or Chef)
        Returns:
        true if the user name isn't already taken and all the given information is not empty, false otherwise.

      • personalizeMeal

        public boolean personalizeMeal(java.lang.String mealName,
                               java.lang.String ingredient,
                               java.lang.String quantity)
        Personalize an ingredient in a certain meal. If the ingredient doesn't exists, it will add it, and otherwise it will only change the quantity of the ingredient specified. In order to allow both the personnalized and the original meal to coexist in the system, a new meal will be created with the name "Modified mealName". The ingredients will be exactly the same except for the one that has been modified in the method.
        Parameters:
        mealName - the name of the meal.
        ingredient - the ingredient to change.
        quantity - the new quantity for the ingredient. ("0g" if wanted to be removed)
        Returns:
        true if the meal was correctly personalized, false otherwise.

      • saveOrder

        public boolean saveOrder()
        Saves a non null order in the order map and incrementing the order counter of each meal in it if the current user is a client.
        Returns:
        true if the order was stored in the map and current user is a client, false otherwise.

      • addInfo

        public boolean addInfo(java.lang.String typeContact,
                       java.lang.String info,
                       boolean favorite)
        Adds or updates a contact information to the current user (it can be the favorite contact information or not).
        Parameters:
        typeContact - the type of contact ("email", "telephone number",...)
        info - the actual information ("johnred@mymail.com","0601010101", ..)
        favorite - true if this information is the favorite contact information of the user.
        Returns:
        true if correctly added or updated the contact info, false otherwise.

      • addBirthday

        public boolean addBirthday(java.lang.String birthday)
                    throws java.text.ParseException
        Adds or updates current user's birthday.
        Parameters:
        birthday - the birthday date in this format dd/MM/yyyy
        Returns:
        true if correctly added or updated the contact info, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if the beginning of the specified string cannot be parsed.

      • associateCard

        public boolean associateCard(classes.User user,
                             enums.FidelityCard typeCard)
        Associate a fidelity card to any user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user for which we want to associate a fidelity card
        typeCard - the type of the card to be associated to the current user. Can be "Lottery", "Point" or "Basic".
        Returns:
        true if typeCard is a know type of card and current user is a client, false otherwise.

      • associateAgreement

        public boolean associateAgreement(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String agreementType,
                                  boolean agree)
        Associate an agreement for a certain client.
        Parameters:
        username - user name of the client
        agreementType - the type of the agreement
        agree - true if the user agrees to this type of notification
        Returns:
        true if the user is a registered client, false otherwise.

      • showMeal

        public java.util.Set<classes.Meal> showMeal(enums.OrderingCriteria orderingCriteria)
        Given a certain criteria, returns the meals of meals respecting it. If the ordering criteria is not known, return all the meals.
        Parameters:
        orderingCriteria - a criteria to sort the meals. Usually "OnSale", "NotOnSale", "Modified" and "NotModified"
        Returns:
        a set of meals respecting the ordering criteria.

      • showMeal

        public java.util.Set<classes.Meal> showMeal()

      • listIngredients

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> listIngredients(java.lang.String mealName)
        Get the map of ingredients and their quantities for a certain meal.
        Parameters:
        mealName - the name of a meal.
        Returns:
        a map with ingredients as keys and their quantities as value. If the meal is not known, return null.

      • createMeal

        public boolean createMeal(java.lang.String mealName,
                          double price)
        Create new current meal if current user is a chef.
        Parameters:
        mealName - name of the meal to create.
        price - price of the meal to create.
        Returns:
        true if the current user is chef, false otherwise.

      • addIngredient

        public boolean addIngredient(java.lang.String ingredient,
                             java.lang.String quantity)
        Add an ingredient with non-zero quantity to the current meal.
        Parameters:
        ingredient - name of the ingredient.
        quantity - quantity of the ingredient
        Returns:
        true if the ingredient was well added

      • saveMeal

        public boolean saveMeal()
        Saves the current meal to the meals map if the user is a chef, then proceeds to reinitialize the current Meal attribute.
        Returns:
        true if current user is a chef, false otherwise.

      • putInSpecialOffer

        public boolean putInSpecialOffer(java.lang.String mealName,
                                 double newPrice)
        Puts an existing meal in a special offer if current user is a chef. The difference between the old and the new price is the discount that the client (with a basic fidelity card) will get each time he orders the meal in question.
        Parameters:
        mealName - the name of the meal.
        newPrice - the new price of the meal.
        Returns:
        true if the meal exists and the new price is different from the old and current user is a chef, false otherwise.

      • removeFromSpecialOffer

        public boolean removeFromSpecialOffer(java.lang.String mealName)
        Removes a meal from special offers if current user is a chef. If the meal is in a temporary special offer, it will only set it price back to the usual one. However, if the meal has been added through the insertOffer method, it will be removed from the system.
        Parameters:
        mealName - the name of the meal.
        Returns:
        true if the meal exists and current user is a chef, false otherwise.

      • insertOffer

        public boolean insertOffer(java.lang.String mealName,
                           double price)
        Creates a current meal with a new special offer if current user is a chef. The meals created through this method can be ordered by any client (not only by those with a Basic Fidelity Card). These meals represent temporary offers that can be removed easily from the system with the method removeFromSpecialOffer.
        Parameters:
        mealName - the name of the meal.
        price - the price of the meal.
        Returns:
        true if the meal does not already exist and current user is a chef, false otherwise.

      • notifyAd

        public boolean notifyAd(java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String mealName,
                        double specialPrice)
        Notifies users that agreed to have notifications about special offers of a current special offer. This method also puts the meal into a special offer.
        Parameters:
        message - Message related to the special offer.
        mealName - Name of the meal that is on sale
        specialPrice - The new price of the meal. Should be inferior to the normal price.
        Returns:
        true if current user is a chef and a special offer was created, false otherwise.

      • notifyBirthday

        public boolean notifyBirthday()
        Notifies the users that have their birthdays on the day specified to the system that they can enjoy a discount for this special occasion.
        Returns:
        true if current user is a chef, false otherwise.

      • selectMeal

        public boolean selectMeal(java.lang.String mealName,
                          int quantity)
        Add a quantity of meal to the current order. If no order is currently being made, a new order will be created. If the meal had already been ordered, the quantity with which it had been ordered will be changed. If the quantity is set to 0, the meal will be deleted from the order.
        Parameters:
        mealName - the name of the meal
        quantity - the quantity of the meal
        Returns:
        true if the meal name corresponds to an actual meal, false otherwise.
